    • Method Detail

      • combineSplit

        @Nonnull
public static String combineSplit(@Nonnull
                                            String[] split,
                                            int start,
                                            int length,
                                            @Nonnull
                                            String delimiter)
        Combines an array into a super string!

        Invalid index or length, or a length too long for the array, will be ignored.

        Parameters:
        split - the split array
        start - index at which to start
        length - how many elements to include
        delimiter - delimiter
        Returns:
        the combined string
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - for a null array, a length less than 1, an index less than 0, or a null delimiter

public static String combineSplit(@Nonnull
                                            String[] split,
                                            int start)
        Combines an array into a space-delimited string from a starting index.

        Invalid starting index will result

        Parameters:
        split - the split array
        start - index at which to start
        Returns:
        the combined string
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - for null array or index less than 0

        Parameters:

        colorOrder - order of colors to send
        Returns:
        the colorful new message
        Throws:
